txt.en: 'A band of miners from the Deep Descent has pushed forth into the Silvertine Lodes to establish a small mining-camp in the centre of this area.\n\n'You should seek Thalfar along the path towards Menem-berej and give him my regards! He will likely need your help getting things started.'
'Hail, traveller! Are you here to help us get our feet wet? Good! We can always use another pair of hands.'
Thalfar has set up a camp near the centre of the Silvertine Lodes and will likely need help with the mining endeavours there.
Talk to Thalfar at his mining-camp
Thalfar is at the central mining-camp of the Silvertine Lodes, south from the Deep Descent camp.\n\nYou should speak with Thalfar at his mining-camp.
